name: Aerospace
description: Companies involved in the design, manufacture, and maintenance of aircraft and spacecraft

name: Agriculture
description: Businesses involved in farming and food production

name: Automotive
description: Companies involved in the design, manufacture, and sale of motor vehicles

name: Consumer Products/Packaged Goods
description: Companies that manufacture and sell consumer goods

name: Distribution/Transportation
description: Companies involved in logistics and transportation services

name: Electronics
description: Companies involved in the design and manufacture of electronic devices

name: Financial Services/Banking
description: Companies providing financial services and banking operations

name: Government/Military
description: Government and military organizations

name: Healthcare
description: Companies providing medical services and healthcare products

name: Industrial Products
description: Manufacturers of industrial machinery and equipment

name: Insurance
description: Companies providing insurance services

name: Media and Entertainment
description: Companies involved in media production and entertainment

name: Non-Profit
description: Non-profit organizations and charities

name: Other
description: Miscellaneous industries not covered by other categories

name: Petroleum/Chemical
description: Companies involved in oil, gas, and chemical production

name: Pharmaceutical
description: Companies involved in drug development and manufacturing

name: Rental
description: Companies providing rental services for equipment and vehicles

name: Research Organization
description: Organizations focused on scientific research and development

name: Retail and Wholesale
description: Companies involved in retail and wholesale trade

name: Services
description: Companies providing various professional services

name: Telecom
description: Companies providing telecommunications services

name: Unknown
description: Industry classification not specified

name: Utility
description: Companies providing public utilities (electricity, water, etc.)

name: Waste Management/Environmental
description: Companies involved in waste management and environmental services

name: Mining
description: Companies involved in mineral extraction and mining operations
